name: Umbrella Company Services
summary: Access Financial is a global payroll, contract management and umbrella
short_description:
As Switzerland weathers the storm of the European financial crisis, expatriate workers continue to migrate from neighbouring countries in the hope of finding financial security. Instead they find themselves trying to survive, competing for fewer and fewer jobs amongst a growing population.

Figures show that there were estimated 70,000-180,000 illegal immigrants in Switzerland in 2010 and as surrounding countries struggle economically, experts anticipate that this figure has only continued to increase over recent years. With some of the world’s most expensive cities, times in Switzerland are tough and business is slower than we have seen for some years.
